pageProduct.name: Organic Care Kids Detangling Spray 250ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

OC Kids Detangling Conditioning Spray Berry Bliss specially formulated to ease those stubborn knots and tangles, whilst leaving hair shiny and smelling sweet.

Plant derived ingredients naturally kind detangler.

Not tested on animals.

No petrochemical cleansers, sles, als or parabens.

Product Claims: Not tested on animals. No petrochemical cleansers, sles, als or parabens.

Size: 250mL

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. If eye contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water. If rash or irritation occurs, discontinue use. For external use only.

Ingredients

Water, PEG-12 Dimethicone, Phenoxyethanol, Cetrimonium Chloride*, Polyquaternium-10*, Ethylhexylglycerin, Panthenol, Laurdimonium Hydroxypropyl Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein*, Fragrance, Organic Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Extract, Organic Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice.
*Plant Derived.

Directions

Shake well before use. Apply to wet or dry hair and comb through for even distribution to ensure best detangling results. Avoid spraying into and around the eyes.

USAGE ADVICE

For best results use with Organic Care Kids 3 in 1 Berry Bliss Conditioning Shampoo & Body Wash.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Bottle made from 50% recycled HDPE. Bottle. Pump. arl.org.au

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
